Title: Object: La tentation de St. Antoine
Description: The temptation of St. Anthony; a young nude woman takes the place of Christ on the cross, behind a demon and pig, in front of the cross the saint in ragged monk clothes, kneeling before a large open book on a stand; with remarque of a bat; illustration to Erastène Ramiro's "Supplément au catalogue de l'oeuvre gravé de Félicien Rops" (Paris: Floury, 1895); after a watercolour by Rops Etching
Bibliographic references: Mascha 1910 / Félicien Rops und sein Werk (995.V)
IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (not described)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
Associated titles: Supplément au catalogue de l'oeuvre gravé de Félicien Rops
